headline: Supermicro, Lambda Expand AI Infrastructure With Nvidia Blackwell-Powered Servers
summary: Super Micro Computer (NASDAQ:SMCI) announced on Monday that Lambda has deployed its extensive lineup of GPU-optimized servers, including Nvidia (NASDAQ:NVDA) Blackwell-based systems, to expand AI infrastructure and deliver high-performance compute solutions to customers. The collaboration, launched in June at Cologix’s COL4 ScalelogixSM data center in Columbus, Ohio, gives the Midwest region enterprise-grade access to next-generation AI capabilities. headline: Lambda Builds AI Factories with Supermicro NVIDIA Blackwell GPU Server Clusters to Deliver Production-ready Next-Gen AI Infrastructure at Scale
summary: Super Micro Computer, Inc. (SMCI), a Total IT Solution Provider for AI/ML, HPC, Cloud, Storage, and 5G/Edge, announced today that Lambda, the Superintelligence Cloud, has deployed a broad portfolio of Supermicro GPU-optimized servers including NVIDIA Blackwell based systems to expand its AI infrastructure and deliver high-performance systems to its customers. headline: The Bull Case For Super Micro Computer (SMCI) Could Change Following Launch of Efficient Liquid-Cooled AI Systems
summary: In August 2025, Super Micro Computer, Inc. announced the expansion of its NVIDIA Blackwell system portfolio, introducing new liquid- and air-cooled AI infrastructure solutions designed to improve efficiency, simplify deployment, and support upcoming NVIDIA platforms for large-scale AI workloads. A unique aspect of these latest offerings is their focus on significantly reducing data center power consumption and water usage, meeting the growing operational and sustainability demands of...

headline: 1 Growth Stock to Stash and 2 We Turn Down
summary: Growth is a hallmark of all great companies, but the laws of gravity eventually take hold. Those who rode the COVID boom and ensuing tech selloff in 2022 will surely remember that the market’s punishment can be swift and severe when trajectories fall.
